sqlMap.sql:
SELECT SUBT1.* FROM ( SELECT T1.RN , T1.PRJ_ID , T1.DPL_ID , T1.DPL_NM , T1.DPL_VER , T1.DPL_DT , T1.DPL_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.DPL_USR_ID, 1) AS DPL_USR_NM , SF_REPLACE_ALL(T1.DPL_DESC ,'
|
|
|
|
|
' , CHR(10)) AS DPL_DESC , T1.DPL_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00001', T1.DPL_STS_CD, '1') AS DPL_STS_NM , T1.DPL_TYPE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00003', T1.DPL_TYPE_CD, '1') AS DPL_TYPE_NM , T1.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00004', T1.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD, '1') AS DPL_AUTO_AFTER_NM , T1.DPL_AUTO_DTM , T1.DPL_RESTORE_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'DPL00005', T1.DPL_RESTORE_CD, '1') AS DPL_RESTORE_NM , T1.SIGN_STS_CD , SF_ADM4100_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'REQ00004', T1.SIGN_STS_CD, '1') AS SIGN_STS_NM , T1.SIGN_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.SIGN_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.SIGN_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_USR_IMG , T1.SIGN_TXT , T1.SIGN_DTM , T1.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 1) SIGN_REG_USR_NM , SF_ADM2000_USR_INFO(T1.SIGN_REG_USR_ID, 6) SIGN_REG_USR_IMG , T1.REG_DTM , T1.REG_USR_ID , T1.REG_USR_IP , T1.MODIFY_DTM , T1.MODIFY_USR_ID , T1.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RN , A.PRJ_ID , A.DPL_ID , A.DPL_NM , A.DPL_VER , A.DPL_DT , A.DPL_USR_ID , A.DPL_DESC , A.DPL_STS_CD , A.DPL_TYPE_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_AFTER_CD , A.DPL_AUTO_DTM , A.DPL_RESTORE_CD , B.SIGN_STS_CD , B.SIGN_USR_ID , B.SIGN_TXT , B.SIGN_DTM , B.SIGN_REG_USR_ID , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM DPL1000 A LEFT JOIN DPL1200 B ON ( A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID ) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.DPL_DEL_CD = '02' AND DPL_STS_CD = #dplStsCd# AND B.SIGN_DTM = ( SELECT SIGN_DTM FROM DPL1200 Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND Z.DPL_ID = B.DPL_ID ORDER BY SIGN_DTM DESC LIMIT 1 ) ) T1 ) SUBT1 WHERE 1=1 UPPER(SUBT1.DPL_VER) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' UPPER(SUBT1.DPL_NM) LIKE '%'|| UPPER( #searchTxt# )||'%' SUBT1.DPL_USR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' SUBT1.DPL_DESC LIKE '%'||#searchTxt#||'%' SUBT1.DPL_TYPE_CD = #searchCd#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (
) T1 WHERE RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex# ORDER BY T1.DPL_NM ASC
